hanzi-su-wiki:
醜

Значения

Безобразный, уродливый

Мнемоника

Безобразный, упившийся вином 酉 «до чёртиков» 鬼.

Варианты

丑
purpleculture_pinyin:
chǒu
shameful; ugly; disgraceful
постыдный; уродливый; позорный
rtega_mnemonic:
醜醜RSugly looking, homely, disgraceful
  • ugly monster 鬼 locked up in a jar 酉
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 丑)
Antonyms: 美
Pictophonetic: 酉 indicates the sound; 鬼 (demon) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
醜惡 [ chǒu è ]: ugly; repulsive
醜聞 [ chǒu wén ]: scandal
醜陋 [ chǒu lòu ]: ugly
丑角 [ chǒu jué ]: clown role in opera; clown; buffoon
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 酉 [ yǒu ] wine; wine vessel; chemical
    • 鬼 [ guǐ ] ghost; demon; sly, mischievous
heisig_chinese_memo: The ugly oni can't get a date so he drinks sake by himself at the bar.
heisig_constituent: ugly, whiskey bottle, ghost, oni, drop, brains, rice field, human legs, elbow
koohiiStory1: The ugly oni can´t get a date so he drinks sake by himself at the bar.
koohiiStory2: Drinking too much whisky can make you as ugly as an oni.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Give alcohol to a demon and you'll see how ugly it really is. Demons need to concentrate to keep their disguises going. Even if it looked pretty when you met it, like super handsome, give it a few drinks and its facade will slide off and reveal its super gross demon face.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the drunk demon as its pretty face drips off revealing the ugly crap piled underneath.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The ugly demon is drunk and taking off his shoes (しゅう) and swinging them around his head. And, oh no, he's drinking more alcohol out of the shoes.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The demon drinking alcohol out of its nasty shoes is the ugliest scene you've ever seen.
Ru_Radicals: 儿 (ножки), 匕 (ложка), 田 (рисовое поле), 酉 (знак Петуха), 鬼 (чёрт)
Ru_trainchinese:
chǒu: (прил) некрасивый, безобразный, уродливый
chǒu: (графема) позорный, скандальный; стыд, позор
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a sake flask (酉) turns the ogre (鬼) ugly
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The ugly oni can't get a date so he drinks sake by himself at the bar.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts with " ghost " and " unitary " sound. Inscriptions on the Shang Dynasty or " unitary plus" Down " its " shape, like Sheng " unitary " thing (Yu Yongliang). In the late Western Zhou Dynasty, the word " ugly " was superimposed next to " dog ", and its meaning is unknown. "Shuowen": "Ugly, hateful. From ghosts, unitary sound." Duan Yucai's note: "It's not a real ghost. It's hateful, so follow the ghost."

The oracle bone inscriptions, "Collection" 4654: "Long 㞢 (有) ugly", and "Collection" 12878: "㞢 (有) ugly in...". The meaning of the word " ugly " is unknown. Li Xiaoding thinks that " ugly " should be interpreted as hatred and anger. The whole sentence refers to the emperor's anger in a certain place, and quotes "Huainanzi. "Said Lin": "Don't be ugly in color." Gao Yuu's note: "I'm still angry." Yao Xiaosui thinks that " ugliness " is better interpreted as disgust and disgust. The whole sentence refers to God's aversion to a certain party. "poetry. Zheng Feng. "Zunda Road": "I am not selfless." Duan Yucai, "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": """" means "ugly"." Mao Heng's biography: "", abandon." Zheng Xuan's note: "I, also evil and also."

The inscription " Chou " is used as the name of the clan, such as Ya Chou Ding: "Ya Chou." Also used as the name of the country, Guo Zhong簠: "Guo Zhong (Zhong) Zha (as) Chou Jiang Bao簠." "簠" is a food vessel , The whole sentence refers to the treasures made by Guo Zhong for the Jiang surnamed Chouguo (Li Qingli, Yang Fengtao).

Qin Tao is used as the name of the person. "Ancient Pottery Prose Compilation" 5.15: "Xianting 𤎩 (燧) Yang Chou ware", refers to the Xianting people Sui Yang Chou vessel.

" Ugly " on the Qin Bamboo Slips of Sleeping Tiger Land is used as ugly, "Sleeping Tiger Qin Bamboo Slips. "Yu Shu" Jian 12: "Ugly words", that is, bad words. Also, Mawangdui silk script is used as a shame, "Mawangdui silk book. Warring States Political Strategist Book. Su Qin Says Wang Zhang of Qi (4)" line 132: "It is the story sentence (gou), although the minister is not ugly." The full sentence means that if the matter is successful, the minister will not feel ashamed even if he died. "Lu's Spring and Autumn. Relying on the Lord: "I will die, and the world will not know his ministers after being ugly." Gao Yin's note: "Ugly, shameful."

" Ugly " in the handed down document is interpreted as the enemy, "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Out of the car": "You get ugly in the interrogation." Zheng Xuanjian: "Ugly, everyone is also." Gao Heng's note: "Zhou people call foreign enemies ugly." So the "Book of Songs" sentence refers to capturing the enemy. "Historical Records. Biography of General Hussar: "You get ugly in the interrogation, and there are more than a million horses, cattle and sheep." Zhang Shoujie Zhengyi: "Interrogation, inquire. ." Later, from the enemy, there is the righteousness of everyone, "Qi Min Yao Shu. "Bamboo": "Bamboo has four ugliness, there are blue bitter, white bitter, purple bitter, and yellow bitter."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " ghosts ", " unitary " sound, the original meaning is unknown, suspect extended from the surface to the ghost of beauty and ugliness " ugly ."
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「鬼」，「酉」聲。商代金文或於「酉」下加「其」形，象盛「酉」之物(余永梁)。西周晚期又於「醜」字疊加「犬」旁，其義不詳。《說文》：「醜，可惡也。从鬼，酉聲。」段玉裁注：「非真鬼也。以可惡，故从鬼。」

　　甲骨文辭殘，《合集》4654：「龍㞢(有)醜」，又《合集》12878正：「㞢(有)醜于……」。「醜」字字義不詳，李孝定以為「醜」當解作憎惡、加怒，全句指帝將加怒於某方，並引《淮南子．說林》：「莫不醜于色。」高誘注：「猶怒也。」姚孝遂以為「醜」釋為厭惡、嫌棄較佳，全句指上天厭棄某方。《詩．鄭風．遵大路》：「無我魗兮。」段玉裁《說文解字注》：「『魗』即『醜』字。」毛亨傳：「魗，棄也。」鄭玄注：「魗，亦惡也。」

　　金文「醜」字用作族氏名，如亞醜鼎：「亞醜。」又用作國名，虢仲簠：「虢中(仲)乍(作)醜姜寶簠。」「簠」是食器，全句指虢仲為姜姓醜國所作寶簠(李清麗、楊峰濤)。

　　秦陶用作人名，《古陶文彙編》5.15：「咸亭𤎩(燧)陽醜器」，指咸亭人燧陽醜的器皿。

　　睡虎地秦簡「醜」用作醜惡，《睡虎地秦簡．語書》簡12：「醜言」，即惡言。又，馬王堆帛書字用作慚愧，《馬王堆帛書．戰國縱橫家書．蘇秦謂齊王章(四)》第132行：「是故事句(苟)成，臣雖死不醜。」全句指因此假若事情成功了，臣雖然死去也不會感到慚愧。《呂氏春秋．恃君》：「吾將死之，以醜後世人主之不知其臣也。」高誘注：「醜，愧也。」

　　傳世文獻「醜」本解作敵眾，《詩．小雅．出車》：「執訊獲醜。」鄭玄箋：「醜，眾也。」高亨注：「周人稱異國敵人為醜。」所以《詩經》句指俘獲敵眾。《史記．將軍驃騎列傳》：「執訊獲醜，驅馬牛羊百有餘萬。」張守節正義：「訊，問也。醜，眾，言執其生口問之，知虜處，獲得眾類也。」後從敵眾引申有眾人之義，《齊民要術．竹》：「竹之醜有四，有青苦者，白苦者，紫苦者，黃苦者。」
humanum_short_description: 從「鬼」，「酉」聲，本義不詳，疑從鬼面引申為美醜之「醜」。

Pinyin: chǒu
English Definition: shameful; ugly; disgraceful
Antonyms: 美
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 酉
Pictophonetic: 酉 indicates the sound; 鬼 (demon) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 酉 [ yǒu ] wine; wine vessel; chemical
    • 鬼 [ guǐ ] ghost; demon; sly, mischievous

醜聞 [ chǒu wén ]: scandal
醜陋 [ chǒu lòu ]: ugly
丑角 [ chǒu jué ]: clown role in opera; clown; buffoon
More: 醜* | *醜 | *醜*

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 酉 [ yǒu ] wine; wine vessel; chemical
    • 鬼 [ guǐ ] ghost; demon; sly, mischievous
①地支的第二位，屬牛。
②用於計時：丑時(凌晨一點至三點)。
③傳統戲劇角色名：丑角。丑旦。
④相貌難看：醜陋。
⑤可厭惡的，可恥的，不光榮的：醜化。醜惡。醜聞。醜態百出。跳樑小醜。
⑥醜惡醜陋美俊。

醜字的基本解释

醜
chǒu
见“丑”④⑤。

醜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǒu］
［《廣韻》昌九切，上有，昌。］
“媿2”的今字。
(1)凶，邪恶。
(2)指坏人，恶人。
(3)指怪异之事。
(4)样子难看。
(5)厌恶，憎恶。
(6)羞耻，惭愧。
(7)谓羞辱。
(8)不光彩。
(9)愤怒。
(10)动物的肛门。
(11)类。
(12)众。
(13)比并；相同。

醜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【酉字部】　醜； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1286第09
〔古文〕媿?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?齒九切，犨上聲。【說文】可惡也。【詩·小雅】日有食之，亦孔之醜。【傳】醜，惡也。【左傳·文十八年】醜類惡物。【註】醜，亦惡也。【前漢·項羽紀】項王爲天下宰不平，今盡王故王於醜地。　又【釋名】臭也，如臭穢也。　又惡之也。【左傳·昭二十八年】惡直醜正，實蕃有徒。【史記·殷本紀】伊尹去湯適夏，旣醜有夏，復歸於亳。　又相惡也。【戰國策】又身自醜於秦。【註】自醜於秦，與秦惡也。　又羞也。【史記·魏世家】以羞先君宗廟社稷，寡人甚醜之。又【韓非傳】在知飾所說之所敬，而滅其所醜。【註】索隱曰：謂人主有所避諱而醜之，游說者當滅其事端而不言也。　又貌惡也。【前漢·五行志】或形貌醜惡，亦是也。【淮南子·說山訓】不求美，又不求醜，則無美無醜矣。　又類也。【易·漸卦】夫征不復，離羣醜也。【疏】醜，類也。【孟子】地醜德齊。　又衆也。【詩·小雅】執訊獲醜。【箋】醜，衆也。【左傳·定四年】將其醜類。【註】醜，衆也。　又比也。【禮·

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chǒu］
["Guangyun" Chang nine cuts, there is on it, Chang. ]
The modern word for "ashamed 2".
(1) Fierce and evil.
(2) Refers to bad people, wicked people.
(3) Refers to weird things.
(4) It looks ugly.
(5) Disgust, hate.
(6) Shame, ashamed.
(7) It means humiliation.
(8) Disgraceful.
(9) Anger.
(10) The anus of an animal.
(11) Class.
(12) The public.
(13) Compare and merge; the same.

Name meaning

chǒu
вм. 丑
Radicals: 酉, 鬼  (alcohol, demon)
Meaning Mnemonic
Give alcohol to a demon and you'll see how ugly it really is. Demons need to concentrate to keep their disguises going. Even if it looked pretty when you met it, like super handsome, give it a few drinks and its facade will slide off and reveal its super gross demon face.
Picture the drunk demon as its pretty face drips off revealing the ugly crap piled underneath.
Reading Mnemonic
The ugly demon is drunk and taking off his shoes (しゅう) and swinging them around his head. And, oh no, he's drinking more alcohol out of the shoes.
The demon drinking alcohol out of its nasty shoes is the ugliest scene you've ever seen.
